Heading: Distinctive title (book); Cover title (serial); Title on item (serial content item or reviewed resource)
Note: The full text of the distinctive title of the item, without abbreviation or abridgement. For books, where the title alone is not distinctive, elements may be taken from a set or series title and part number etc to create a distinctive title. Where the item is an omnibus edition containing two or more works by the same author, and there is no separate combined title, a distinctive title may be constructed by concatenating the individual titles, with suitable punctuation, as in ‘Pride and prejudice / Sense and sensibility / Northanger Abbey’

Heading: Title in original language
Note: Where the subject of the ONIX record is a translated item

Heading: Title acronym or initialism
Note: For serials: an acronym or initialism of Title Type 01, eg ‘JAMA’, ‘JACM’

Heading: Abbreviated title
Note: An abbreviated form of Title Type 01

Heading: Title in other language
Note: A translation of Title Type 01 into another language

Heading: Thematic title of journal issue
Note: Serials only: when a journal issue is explicitly devoted to a specified topic

Heading: Former title
Note: Books or serials: when an item was previously published under another title

Heading: Distributor’s title
Note: For books: the title carried in a book distributor’s title file: frequently incomplete, and may include elements not properly part of the title

Heading: Alternative title on cover
Note: An alternative title that appears on the cover of a book

Heading: Alternative title on back
Note: An alternative title that appears on the back of a book

Heading: Expanded title
Note: An expanded form of the title, eg the title of a school text book with grade and type and other details added to make the title meaningful, where otherwise it would comprise only the curriculum subject. This title type is required for submissions to the Spanish ISBN Agency

Heading: Alternative title
Note: An alternative title that the book is widely known by, whether it appears on the book or not
